abstract: Constellation Energy has dropped its agreement to sell itself to a company controlled by Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, favoring a transaction with Electricite de France instead.
lead_paragraph: Constellation Energy has dropped its agreement to sell itself to a company controlled by Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, favoring a transaction with Electricite de France instead.

headline.main: Constellation Bids Adieu to Warren Buffett
